---
title: "override.css"
---

## High-level description

The `override.css` file is a custom CSS stylesheet used to override and customize the default styles provided by the Furo theme and potentially other themes or stylesheets. It defines specific styles for various HTML elements and classes to ensure consistent and visually appealing documentation presentation. The file includes styles for code blocks, citations, introductory cards, buttons, and notebook input/output containers.

## Code Structure

The CSS file is structured into several sections, each targeting different elements or classes within the documentation. These sections include styles for code elements, citation lists, introductory cards, custom buttons, and notebook containers. The styles are applied using CSS selectors that target specific HTML elements and classes.

## Symbols

### `dt:target, span.highlighted`
#### Description
This style rule applies a background color to targeted definition terms and highlighted spans.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| background-color | CSS property | Sets the background color to `#f0f0f0` for targeted elements. |

### `code.docutils.literal.notranslate.xref, a code`
#### Description
This rule styles code elements within links and specific literal code elements, making them bold and transparent in background.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| background | CSS property | Sets the background to transparent. |
| font-weight | CSS property | Sets the font weight to bold. |
| color | CSS property | Inherits the color from the parent element. |

### `a &gt; code`
#### Description
Ensures that code elements within anchor tags inherit the color of their parent.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| color | CSS property | Inherits the color from the parent element. |

### `code.docutils.literal.notranslate`
#### Description
Styles literal code elements with a specific background, font size, border radius, and padding.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| background | CSS property | Sets the background to `#f8f9fb`. |
| font-size | CSS property | Sets the font size to `87.5%`. |
| border-radius | CSS property | Sets the border radius to `.2em`. |
| color | CSS property | Sets the color to `#000000`. |
| word-wrap | CSS property | Enables word wrapping. |
| padding | CSS property | Sets padding to `.1em .2em`. |

### `dl.citation &gt; dt`
#### Description
Styles the definition term within citation lists to float left and have a bold font weight.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| float | CSS property | Floats the element to the left. |
| margin-right | CSS property | Sets the right margin to `15px`. |
| font-weight | CSS property | Sets the font weight to bold. |

### `dl.c .field-list dt, dl.cpp .field-list dt, dl.js .field-list dt, dl.py .field-list dt`
#### Description
Normalizes the font size and text transformation for field list definition terms in various programming language documentation.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| font-size | CSS property | Uses a CSS variable for normal font size. |
| text-transform | CSS property | Sets text transformation to none. |

### `p.rubric`
#### Description
Styles rubric paragraphs with a normal font size, no text transformation, and medium font weight.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| font-size | CSS property | Uses a CSS variable for normal font size. |
| text-transform | CSS property | Sets text transformation to none. |
| font-weight | CSS property | Sets the font weight to 500. |

### `.intro-card`
#### Description
Styles introductory cards with a white background, no border radius, and specific padding and margin.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| background | CSS property | Sets the background to white. |
| border-radius | CSS property | Sets the border radius to 0. |
| padding | CSS property | Sets padding to `30px 10px 10px 10px`. |
| margin | CSS property | Sets margin to `10px 0px`. |

### `.custom-button`
#### Description
Defines the appearance of custom buttons with a specific background color, text color, and other styling properties.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| background-color | CSS property | Sets the background color to `#dcdcdc`. |
| border | CSS property | Sets the border to none. |
| color | CSS property | Sets the text color to `#484848`. |
| text-align | CSS property | Centers the text. |
| text-decoration | CSS property | Removes text decoration. |
| display | CSS property | Sets display to inline-block. |
| font-size | CSS property | Sets the font size to `0.9rem`. |
| border-radius | CSS property | Sets the border radius to `0.5rem`. |
| max-width | CSS property | Sets the maximum width to `220px`. |
| padding | CSS property | Sets padding to `0.5rem 0rem`. |

### `.nbinput .prompt, .nboutput .prompt`
#### Description
Hides the prompt in notebook input and output containers.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| display | CSS property | Sets display to none. |

### `.nboutput .stderr`
#### Description
Hides the standard error output in notebook output containers.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| display | CSS property | Sets display to none. |

### `div.nblast.container`
#### Description
Styles the last notebook container with specific padding and margin.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| padding-bottom | CSS property | Sets bottom padding to `5px`. |
| padding-right | CSS property | Sets right padding to `0px`. |
| padding-left | CSS property | Sets left padding to `0px`. |
| margin-bottom | CSS property | Sets bottom margin to `10px`. |

### `div.nbinput.container, div.nboutput.container`
#### Description
Styles notebook input and output containers with flex display, alignment, and specific margin and padding.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| display | CSS property | Sets display to flex. |
| align-items | CSS property | Aligns items to flex-start. |
| margin | CSS property | Sets margin to `0px 0px 5px 0px`. |
| padding | CSS property | Sets padding to `0px`. |
| width | CSS property | Sets width to `100%`. |

## References

The file references CSS variables and styles from the Furo theme and other external stylesheets, as indicated by the comments at the top of the file. These references suggest that the file is intended to customize or override styles from these sources.

## Dependencies

The file does not explicitly import or depend on external libraries, but it is designed to work in conjunction with the Furo theme and potentially other themes or stylesheets used in the documentation.

There are no TODOs or notes left in the code.
